meta.title: Aero Prosthetics - Advanced Prosthetic Solutions
meta.description: Aero Prosthetics provides cutting-edge prosthetic and orthotic solutions with personalized care and comprehensive support.

hero.title: Innovative Prosthetic Solutions for Enhanced Mobility
hero.subtitle: Empowering lives through personalized care and cutting-edge technology

items.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
items.description: Advanced 3D printing and custom designs for optimal fit and function

items.title: Personalized Care
items.description: Individualized treatment plans tailored to your unique needs

items.title: Comprehensive Support
items.description: Complete rehabilitation services and ongoing assistance

items.title: Experienced Team
items.description: Specialists with extensive training and expertise

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive prosthetic and orthotic solutions for all needs

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower individuals through personalized, innovative prosthetic solutions that enhance mobility, independence, and quality of life, while fostering compassion, education, and long-term support.

items.title: Patient-Centered Care
items.description: We prioritize your unique needs and goals in every decision

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We continuously seek advanced solutions to improve outcomes

items.title: Compassion
items.description: We approach every interaction with empathy and understanding

items.title: Excellence
items.description: We maintain the highest standards in all aspects of our practice

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet our dedicated team of specialists committed to your care

history.title: Our Story
history.description: Founded with a vision to transform prosthetic care through innovation and personalization, Aero Prosthetics has grown to become a leader in advanced prosthetic and orthotic solutions in Southern California.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive prosthetic and orthotic solutions tailored to your needs

categories.title: Lower Limb Prosthetics
categories.description: Custom-designed prosthetic solutions for below-knee, above-knee, and partial foot amputations

categories.title: Upper Limb Prosthetics
categories.description: Advanced prosthetic options for hand, wrist, elbow, and shoulder amputations

categories.title: Pediatric Prosthetics
categories.description: Specialized prosthetic solutions designed for children's unique needs and growth

categories.title: Orthotics
categories.description: Custom bracing solutions for spine, lower limb, and upper limb conditions

categories.title: Compression Garments
categories.description: Medical-grade compression solutions for various conditions

categories.title: Mastectomy Products
categories.description: Specialized breast forms and post-mastectomy products

categories.title: Cranial Helmets
categories.description: Custom-designed helmets for treating plagiocephaly in infants

categories.title: Custom Bracing
categories.description: Personalized bracing solutions for scoliosis, cervical conditions, and knee injuries

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: Comprehensive evaluation of your needs and goals

steps.title: Custom Design
steps.description: Personalized design and measurement for optimal fit

steps.title: Fabrication
steps.description: Creation of your custom prosthetic or orthotic device

steps.title: Fitting & Adjustment
steps.description: Precise fitting and necessary adjustments for comfort

steps.title: Training & Support
steps.description: Guidance on use and ongoing support for optimal outcomes
